mode_L4.view.modele

Class Painter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • mode_L4.view.modele.Painter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ModeleObserver

    public class Painter
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements ModeleObserver
    Dessine les faces et points d'un Modele en fonction de ses options.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
